Data Fields
vpsissIsifGainOfstConfig Struct Reference

Structure containing ISIF gain and offset configuration. Sets these parameters in WB submodule, Also used for selecting output to which this WB is applied. More...

#include <vps_cfgisif.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t gain [FVID2_BAYER_COLOR_COMP_MAX]
 
uint32_t offset
 
uint32_t gainEnable [VPS_ISS_ISIF_MAX_OUTPUT]
 
uint32_t offsetEnable [VPS_ISS_ISIF_MAX_OUTPUT]
 

Detailed Description

Structure containing ISIF gain and offset configuration. Sets these parameters in WB submodule, Also used for selecting output to which this WB is applied.

Field Documentation

uint32_t vpsissIsifGainOfstConfig::gain[FVID2_BAYER_COLOR_COMP_MAX]

Gain for each color component, the format: U12Q9. Range: 0 to 7+511/512

uint32_t vpsissIsifGainOfstConfig::gainEnable[VPS_ISS_ISIF_MAX_OUTPUT]

Flag to enable gain multiplication for IPIPE, H3A, Memory outputs

uint32_t vpsissIsifGainOfstConfig::offset

Offset value adjustment, Range is 0 to 4095

uint32_t vpsissIsifGainOfstConfig::offsetEnable[VPS_ISS_ISIF_MAX_OUTPUT]

Flag to enable offset adjustment for IPIPE, H3A, Memory outputs
